author: jorton
msg: Simplify logic of /dev/*random search, reducing to a single AC_DEFINE
expansion for the DEV_RANDOM variable.  This allows the removal of
DEV_RANDOM from acconfig.h even with autoheader 2.13.

author: jorton
msg: Prevent test for C99 variable length arrays from failing with GCC
if CPPFLAGS contains -Wall (e.g. if --enable-maintainer-mode is used).
GCC gave warnings for the unused variable and lack of atoi prototype

author: bnicholes
msg: Need to default to the standard open() call for NetWare when the returned

author: jorton
msg: Advertise the ability to disable DSO support, not an "--enable-dso" flag
which will break the build on many platforms unless used correctly.
(e.g. simply "./configure --enable-dso" doesn't do the right thing)

author: jorton
msg: Add back USE_THREADS and DEV_RANDOM to fix build with autoconf 2.13.
